definition: person in charge of pack animals/chariot driver
variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: He was a good and a careful driver.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個小心謹慎的好馭手。

sentences.english: An old man, a most respectable-looking valet, was sitting on the box with the driver.
sentences.chinese: 同馭手一起坐在前座上的，還有一名可敬的老僕人。
